title: We May Be Old But We're Still Cute
description:
Charly and KMart reminisce on old jobs before getting into why the Colts are a let down, why we're lucky to have Josh Allen, and how much we love Joe Burrow. They also dissect what went wrong in Miami and how we need to do a better job of protecting athletes.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
